title: Grindhaus Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Take-out
description: A locally owned 100% vegetarian cafe with a 100% vegan menu unless you request otherwise. Located in historic preservation district of Allentown, Features handcrafted pour-over coffee and fresh-brewed full-leaf tea along with veg versions of classic sandwiches and sides. Check with them to see if espresso and breakfast food is available.
